Package com.veeva.vault.custom.app.client

Class XmlClient

java.lang.Object
com.veeva.vault.custom.app.client.XmlClient
@Service public class XmlClient extends Object
Client for XML operations, reading XML files and mapping to/from XML models See also com.veeva.vault.custom.app.model.xml

    • openWriter

      public XmlWriter openWriter(File file, String encoding, String version, String dtd) throws ProcessException
      Creates an XmlWriter instance from the designated file, with the given encoding, version and DTD
      Parameters:
      file - The output XML file to write to
      encoding - The encoding of the XML file, to be written in the invalid input: '<'?xml> tag
      version - The version of the XML file, to be written in the invalid input: '<'?xml> tag
      dtd - The DTD of the XML file, to be written in the invalid input: '<'!DOCTYPE> tag
      Returns:
      An XmlWriter instance of the file
      Throws:
      ProcessException
